name: Indy Joan and the Gold Skull
name_original: Indy Joan and the Gold Skull
description:
The adventure starts now! Meet and play with Indy Joan, a girl who loves to collect ancient artifacts. Indy Joan have to get 8 gold skulls that are in a cave full of traps! And what’s worse, a gigantic rock pursues Indy Joan! You will escape the cave?

Indy Joan and the Gold Skull is a fun game with excellent graphics, with 8 levels which increase the difficulty. Many effects and fun sounds. Guarantee hours of fun!
